pkgmetadata.longdescription: # GrabutilsUtils and helpers for crawling websites## Install```shell scriptpip install grabutils```or from Github```shell scriptpip install git+git://github.com/sniter/grabutils.git#egg=grabutils ```## UsageSee tests as usage example## Install ```shell scriptpip install grabutils[all]```For `bs` module:```shell scriptpip install grabutils[bs]```For `rest` module:```shell scriptpip install grabutils[rest]```For `ssh` module:```shell scriptpip install grabutils[ssh]```
